param.doc: Whether or not SCIM header authentication is enabled. This will extract credential information from the request and add the required SCIM headers for authentication.

param.doc: The name of the administrator group. Used to determine if the authenticated user is an administrator.

param.doc: The maximum number of entries that can be returned from a single call to the /User endpoint.

param.name: attribute_modes
param.doc: The customized attribute modes.

param.doc: The list of SCIM external authentication service configuration items.

param.doc: The list of SCIM user profile configuration items.

param.name: urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:extension:enterprise:2.0:User
param.doc: The list of SCIM enterprise user configuration mappings.

param.doc: The list of SCIM group configuration items.

param.name: urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:extension:isam:1.0:User
param.doc: The configuration for the Verify Access user extension.

param.name: schema
param.doc: The name of the schema.

param.name: modes
param.doc: An array of customised attribute modes for the schema.

param.name: connection
param.doc: The UUID of the Web Service Server Connection for the external authentication service.

param.name: schemas
param.doc: The list of supported schemas that are handled by the service.

param.name: id
param.doc: A server-generated sequence number for this external authentication service.

param.name: ldap_connection
param.doc: The name of the ldap server connection.

param.name: ldap_object_classes
param.doc: The list of ldap object classes that are used to indicate a user object.

param.name: search_suffix
param.doc: The suffix from which searches will commence in the LDAP server. If connection_type is set to isamruntime this is used only for Verify Access operations and is optional if not required for that purpose.

param.name: user_suffix
param.doc: The suffix that will house any users that are created through the SCIM interface.

param.name: user_dn
param.doc: The LDAP attribute that will be used to construct the user DN. Defaults to 'cn'.

param.name: connection_type
param.doc: Indicates the type of ldap server connection (ldap or isamruntime). If set to ldap the server details specified in the server connection will be used. If set to isamruntime the configured Verify Access runtime LDAP will be used. This includes any federated directories. If set to isamruntime search_suffix is optional and ldap_connection is ignored. Defaults to ldap.

param.name: attrs_dir
param.doc: The name of a federated directory used to generate the list of available ldap object classes and ldap attribute names. Only valid if the connection_type is set to isamruntime. Defaults to use the Verify Access runtime primary LDAP server.

param.name: enforce_password_policy
param.doc: Set this field to true if SCIM needs to honour the backend password policy when changing a user password. If this is true when a SCIM password update operation takes place and the SCIM parameter "password" is used, the password update will be run by binding to LDAP as the actual user rather than an LDAP administrator. If the SCIM parameter "passwordNoPolicy" is used, the password update will be run by binding to LDAP as the LDAP administrator. Defaults to false.

param.name: user_id
param.doc: The LDAP attribute that will be used as the user ID. Defaults to 'uid'.

param.name: mappings
param.doc: The list of SCIM attribute mappings

param.name: mappings
param.doc: The list of SCIM enterprise user attribute mappings

param.name: ldap_object_classes
param.doc: The list of ldap object classes that are used to indicate a group object.

param.name: group_dn
param.doc: The LDAP attribute that will be used to construct the group DN.

param.name: ldap_connection
param.doc: The name of the ldap server connection to the Verify Access user registry. If a connection is not specified the SCIM application will not attempt to manage Verify Access users.

param.name: isam_domain
param.doc: The name of the Verify Access domain. This will default to: 'Default'.

param.name: update_native_users
param.doc: Whether the UID of native users should be updated with the Verify Access user identity when an Verify Access user is created. This will default to: false.

param.name: connection_type
param.doc: Indicates the type of ldap server connection (ldap or isamruntime). If set to ldap the server details specified in the server connection will be used. If set to isamruntime the configured Verify Access runtime LDAP will be used. This includes any federated directories. If set to isamruntime search_suffix is optional and ldap_connection is ignored. Defaults to ldap.

param.name: attrs_dir
param.doc: The name of a federated directory used to generate the list of available ldap object classes and ldap attribute names. Only valid if the connection_type is set to isamruntime. Default is not set.

param.name: enforce_password_policy
param.doc: Set this field to true if SCIM needs to honour the backend password policy when changing a user password. If this is true when a SCIM password update operation takes place and the SCIM parameter "password" is used, the password update will be run by binding to LDAP as the actual user rather than an LDAP administrator. If the SCIM parameter "passwordNoPolicy" is used, the password update will be run by binding to LDAP as the LDAP administrator. Defaults to false.

param.name: attribute
param.doc: The name of the attribute.

param.name: mode
param.doc: The mode for the attribute (readonly, writeonly, readwrite, adminwrite or immutable).

param.name: subattribute
param.doc: For a multivalued attribute - the second level SCIM attribute name.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the ldap object class type that is used to indicate a user object.

param.name: scim_attribute
param.doc: The name of the SCIM attribute being mapped

param.name: mapping
param.doc: For a complex SCIM attribute - the list of mappings for this attribute.

param.name: mapping
param.doc: For a simple SCIM attribute - the mapping for this attribute.

param.name: mapping
param.doc: For a multivalued SCIM attribute - the list of extended attribute mappings for this attribute.

param.name: type
param.doc: The type of attribute to map to the SCIM attribute (ldap/session/fixed).

param.name: source
param.doc: The attribute to map to the SCIM attribute.

param.name: scim_subattribute
param.doc: For a multivalued attribute - the second level SCIM attribute name to be mapped. Eg: work or home for SCIM attribute email.

param.name: extended_scim_attributes
param.doc: The list of extended attributes.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the extended attribute (eg: type/primary/display/etc) These are the valid attributes from the schema. The type attribute is a mandatory extended attribute.

param.name: source
param.doc: The source of the name value. Can be an LDAP attribute, session attribute or fixed value depending on the type.

param.name: type
param.doc: The type of attribute to map this scim extended attribute to (ldap/session/fixed). If the name of the extended attribute is "type" this value must be set as "fixed".
